<s> ĠMeridian Ġis Ġin Ġthe Ġhumid Ġsubt rop ical Ġclimate Ġzone Ġ. <s> ĠThe Ġaverage Ġannual Ġprecipitation Ġin Ġthe Ġcity Ġis Ġ58 Ġ@ . @ Ġ65 Ġin Ġ( Ġ1 Ġ@ , @ Ġ490 Ġmm Ġ) Ġ. <s> ĠEarly Ġpublic Ġeducation Ġin ĠMeridian Ġwas Ġbased Ġon Ġthe Ġ1870 ĠMississippi ĠConstitution Ġ. ĠFrom Ġthis Ġbond Ġ, Ġthe ~unk~ ĠSchool Ġwas Ġbuilt Ġin Ġ18 94 Ġ, Ġbecoming Ġthe Ġfirst Ġbrick Ġpublic Ġschool Ġbuilding Ġin Ġthe Ġstate Ġbuilt Ġfor Ġblacks Ġ.  
<s> ĠFrom Ġthis Ġearly Ġdistrict Ġand Ġlater Ġadditions Ġ, Ġthe ĠMeridian ĠPublic ĠSchool ĠDistrict Ġgrew Ġto Ġits Ġcurrent Ġsize Ġ, Ġwhich Ġnow Ġincludes Ġsix Ġelementary Ġschools Ġ, Ġ3 Ġmiddle Ġschools Ġ, Ġand Ġ3 Ġhigh Ġschools Ġ. <s> ĠMeridian Ġis Ġserved Ġby Ġthe ĠMeridian Ġ@ - @ ĠLauderdale ĠCounty ĠPublic ĠLibrary Ġ, Ġlocated Ġat Ġthe Ġcorner Ġof Ġ7 th ĠStreet Ġand Ġ26 th ĠAvenue Ġ. <s> ĠAs Ġthe Ġexisting Ġmilitia Ġforces Ġwere Ġunable Ġto Ġserve Ġoverseas Ġunder Ġthe Ġprovisions Ġof Ġthe ĠDefence ĠAct Ġ1903 Ġ, Ġan Ġall Ġ@ - @ Ġvolunteer Ġexpedition ary Ġforce Ġknown Ġas Ġthe ĠAustralian ĠImperial ĠForce Ġ( ĠA IF Ġ) Ġwas Ġformed Ġand Ġrecruitment Ġbegan Ġon Ġ10 ĠAugust Ġ1914 Ġ.
